title: Trump says he has a buyer for TikTok
shortDescription: President Trump, in an interview on “Sunday Morning Futures,” said there’s “a group of very wealthy people” lined up to buy TikTok.

title: Thom Tillis, a key GOP holdout on Trump tax bill, won't seek reelection
shortDescription: Tillis, first elected to the Senate in 2014, said it was "not a hard choice."

title: 'He wants to distract': Mamdani hits back at Trump criticism
shortDescription: Democratic candidate for New York Mayor Zohran Mamdani denied President Donald Trump's accusations that he supports communism in a new interview.

title: GOP senator says babies born in US should be deported if parents are
shortDescription: Republican senator Markwayne Mullin said he believes babies born in the United States to immigrants living in the country illegally should be deported alongside their parents if the adults are removed.

title: Trump rejects claims Iran nuclear program survived: 'It was obliterated'
shortDescription: Trump insists Iran's nuclear program, hit by U.S. bomb strikes, has been 'destroyed.'

title: US Senate advances Trump's megabill
shortDescription: President Trump's bill passed a key procedural vote in the Senate. Lawmakers voted 51-49.

title: Trump says there's 'a group of very wealthy people' lined up to buy TikTok
shortDescription: Trump said a potential TikTok buyer will be announced in two weeks, but the sale still needs permission from Chinese owners.

title: Trump says US is 'not going to stand' for Netanyahu's corruption trial
shortDescription: In a social media post, Trump said corruption charges against Israel's Netanyahu should be dropped.

title: Trump tax bill could add $3.3 trillion to debt, new estimate says: Live update
shortDescription: The Senate began debating Trump's legislative priorities without knowing whether enough Republicans will vote to approve it.

title: Trump threatens to find GOP primary opponent to Sen. Thom Tillis
shortDescription: Trump threatened to find a primary opponent to GOP Sen. Thom Tillis after the North Carolina lawmaker voted against his legislative package.

title: Trump plays golf ahead of push for Senate megabill vote
shortDescription: Trump, alongside CIA Director John Ratcliffe and three GOP Senate leaders, were at the president's Northern Virginia course Saturday afternoon.

title: Elon Musk says Senate bill is 'political suicide' that will destroy jobs
shortDescription: Former Trump DOGE chief Elon Musk called voting for the Senate megabill 'political suicide'

title: Eric Trump joins family business of White House campaign speculation
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's 41-year-old middle son told the Financial Times he'd consider extending the family dynasty in presidential politics.

title: Trump agenda survives Senate vote; final outcome still up in the air
shortDescription: The GOP-led Senate agreed to begin a floor debate likely to go overnight and end with a final vote. The outcome still remains uncertain.

title: Medicaid cuts, SNAP reforms: What's in the Senate tax bill
shortDescription: Big changes are ahead for Americans if the Trump-backed bill becomes law. Republicans are trying to pass it by a self-imposed July 4 deadline.

title: Trump DOJ fires three Jan. 6 prosecutors: Media reports
shortDescription: The firings come months after President Donald Trump pardoned more than 1,500 people connected to the U.S. Capitol attack.

title: Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' still shrinking. What else has been cut?
shortDescription: Senate rules require removing a plan to charge feeds on new migrants seeking asylum in the U.S. and relocating Space Shuttle Discovery to Houston.

title: Senate readies for weekend work on Trump's mega tax and policy bill
shortDescription: Senate Republicans have sparred with each other and the parliamentarian over a variety of provisions in the sweeping legislation.

title: Trump's aggressive immigration crackdown is getting ICE agents hurt
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says tougher immigration policies are necessary to protect the United States from an 'invasion' of migrants.

title: Could Michelle Obama be the voice Democrats need right now?
shortDescription: As Democrats search to counter Trump it may not be Barack Obama, the party's most popular figure, that they should turn to, but Michelle.

title: Senate rejects resolution to curb Trump's use of military in Iran
shortDescription: Sen. Tim Kaine won approval of a similar resolution to prevent the use of the military in Iran during Trump's first term, but the president vetoed it.

title: Trump stops trade negotiations with Canada
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he's stopped negotiating trade deals with Canada for now.
